Module foms
Package foms.order

Class Order

java.lang.Object
foms.order.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Order extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an order placed by customer.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • deepCopyCart

      public ArrayList<FoodItem> deepCopyCart(Order order)
      Deep copies the cart of the provided order.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to copy the cart from.
      Returns:
      The deep copied cart.

    • addToCart

      public void addToCart(int indexedFoodItem, int filterType, Menu menu)
      Adds a food item to the cart based on the provided index from the filtered menu. Creates a new object and adds it to the cart, copying the object from the menu.
      Parameters:
      indexedFoodItem - The index of the food item to retrieve from the filtered menu.
      filterType - The filter type used.
      menu - The menu object that contains the menu list.

    • removeIndexedFoodItem

      public void removeIndexedFoodItem(int indexOfFoodItemToDelete)
      Removes a food item from the cart.
      Parameters:
      indexOfFoodItemToDelete - The index of the food item to delete from the cart.

    • editFoodItem

      public void editFoodItem(int index)
      Edits a food item in the cart by calling its customiseFoodItem() method.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the selected food item in the cart.

    • displayCart

      public void displayCart()
      Displays and lists all items in the cart.

    • getOrderID

      public int getOrderID()
      Get order ID of the order
      Returns:
      orderID of the order

    • getCart

      public ArrayList<FoodItem> getCart()
      Get Cart Items placed in the cart
      Returns:
      cart items

    • getAmount

      public double getAmount()
      Get the total price of items in cart
      Returns:
      price of all items in cart

    • getOrderStatus

      public OrderStatus getOrderStatus()

    • getOrderStatusInString

      public String getOrderStatusInString()
      Get the order status for this order
      Returns:
      order status

    • setOrderStatus

      public void setOrderStatus(OrderStatus newOrderStatus)
      Change the order status for this order After paying - from PENDING to PREPARING In the processing order - from PREPARING to READYTOPICKUP After customer collected the food - from READYTOPICKUP to COMPLETED If customer canceled order during payment - from PENDING to CANCELED
      Parameters:
      newOrderStatus - this includes Order's new Order Status

    • setDineInOption

      public void setDineInOption(boolean dineInOption)
      Sets the dine-in option for this order.
      Parameters:
      dineInOption - Customer's choice of dine-in option.

    • getCartSize

      public int getCartSize()
      Gets the size of the cart.
      Returns:
      The size of the cart.
